tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE human_rights_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE human_rights_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    budget DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE project_contributors (
    contributor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contributor_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    project_id INT,
    contribution_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY(project_id) REFERENCES human_rights_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    allocated_funds DECIMAL(10, 2),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_id INT,
    activity_date DATE,
    spent_funds DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_id INT,
    role VARCHAR(50),
    allocation_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
 project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 project_description TEXT,
 start_date DATE NOT NULL,
 end_date DATE,
 budget DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE donations (
 donation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 donor_id INT NOT NULL,
 project_id INT NOT NULL,
 donation_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
 donation_date DATE NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (donor_id) REFERENCES donors (donor_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects (project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE expenses (
 expense_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 project_id INT NOT NULL,
 expense_description TEXT,
 expense_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
 expense_date DATE NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects (project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  total_budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE donations (
  donation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID,
  funder_id UUID,
  donation_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  donation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE expenses (
  expense_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID,
  expense_description TEXT,
  expense_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  expense_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE achievements (
  achievement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID,
  achievement_title VARCHAR(255),
  achievement_description TEXT,
  achievement_date DATE
);
